emojis.use: happy and hopeful, or looking forward to something
triumph or superiority over something, similar to crossing arms or "hah"
when doing something effortless, i.e. "piece of cake"
saying something innocent, or used sarcastically when saying something not innocent or slightly evil

ex.message: Wish I could come over and prove it rn 😇

emojis.use: unsure about something, waiting for your reaction. i.e. "oop", sometimes expecting something negative
relieved about something, or embarrassed/apolegetic. i.e. "phew"

ex.message: Me when you didn't even notice 😅
Bowling with Bryan and Isaiah btw 😁😁

emojis.use: stunned / speechless, in awe of something

ex.message: I mean it's about to get a lot better 😳🎧
Nah just means we have good taste 🤝

emojis.use: acknowledgement that I said or did something nerdy/embarrassing

ex.message: It's a way to know what day of the week any date is 🤓

emojis.use: after saying or doing something cool, or if I beat you at something ;)

ex.message: Send him over to the better office, ours is still open 😎

emojis.use: judging you for something! or juding someone else, typically in a negative way. unapproving, disagreeing
confused or thinking about something, typically if I disagree with something you said or something doesn't make sense
when something is funny but also worth grimacing at ("oh boy") alternatively something not good ("yikes")
excited for something, but more eager for it than regularly happy (compared to "😁")
annoyed about something (or at myself), or embarrassed / feel bad about something, upset, used after a sarcastic remark

ex.message: That's the one that I had put in 'special place so I won't forget' then lost it 🙃 [..]
